span.style: font-size:18; font-family:Comic Sans MS; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#550000
font-size:14; font-family:微软雅黑; font-weight:normal; font-style:normal; color:#000000

item.answer:
【考法 1】 v. 责难，抨击： to attack as false or questionable; challenge in argument
【例】 impugn a political opponent's character 就政治对手的人品发难
【近】 attack, assail, contradict, contravene, cross, disaffirm, deny, gainsay, negate, negative, traverse
【反】 advocate, back, support, uphold 支持；authenticate 证实，证明
【记】 pugn- 攻击；音：砰，抨，抨击
【另】 pugnacious 好斗的，pungent (气味、味道)刺激性的, 辛辣的, 尖锐的, 苦痛的, 严厉的
